question:
The India State of Forest Report (ISFR) 2015 states that there has been an increase in:
  1. Very Dense Forest
  2. Open Forest Area
  3. Mangrove Forest
  4. Tree Cover
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: As per the India State of Forest Report (ISFR) 2015, there has been an increase in Very Dense Forest, Open Forest Area, Mangrove Forest and Tree Cover.
